Package index

All functions

barb_add_female_audiences()
Add missing audiences to a spot or programme impacts table
barb_get_advertisers()
Get the list of available advertiser names
barb_get_panels()
Get a tibble of panel names
barb_get_programmes()
Get a tibble of spots from the BARB API
barb_get_spots()
Get a tibble of spots from the BARB API
barb_get_stations()
Get a tibble of station names
barb_manage_query()
Manages sync and async queries with retries for timeout problems on sync queries. Called by barb_get_spots() and barb_get_programmes(). Not called directly by users.
barb_query_api()
Submit a query to the BARB API. Not called directly by users.
barb_rollup_spots()
Roll up raw spot data by broadcast time
